content.text:
# Mexican League Manager of the Year Award

The Mexican League Manager of the Year Award is presented annually since 2005 to the most outstanding manager in the baseball Mexican League, as selected by a vote of members of the press.

Notes
*  The 2018 season was contested in a two-tournament format known as Spring and Autumn. The Sultanes won the Autumn tournament. The record presented reflects the whole season.
